other.text: For many indigenous Papuans, the ice sheets represent a sacred symbol.

definition.zh_def: 代表，表現，象徵某事物或某人的行為或狀態。
definition.en_def: To act or speak on behalf of someone or something; to symbolize or depict.
definition.example: She was chosen to represent her school at the science fair.
